price: Na hakika Mola wako Mlezi ndiye Yeye Mwenye nguvu Mwenye kurehemu.
footnotes: Hakika Mwenye kumiliki mambo yako, na Mwenye kukulinda, ndiye atakaye waadhibu hao wanao kadhibisha, na ndiye Mwenye kuwafadhili Waumini kwa rehema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
